backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw backend defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases, user profiles, and OpenAI config with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report identifying a Version 94 frontend regression causing blank case lists, pointing to WorkflowIcon.tsx, CaseCard.tsx, ChecklistEditor.tsx, and useQueries.ts as the affected files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing the purpose and key details of each component, hook, utility, and type definition in the SurgiPaw frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SurgiPaw PWA, referencing the app icon, web manifest, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, display mode, theme colors, and icon assets at multiple resolutions.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy with precaching of app shell assets, runtime caching of static files, and exclusions for auth and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal, and a sticky header with login controls.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: SVG icon component for the Culture workflow task rendered via WorkflowIconBase with its designated color token.
SVG icon component for the Discharge Notes workflow task showing a document with a checkmark.
SVG icon component for the Follow-Up workflow task showing a circular arrow.
SVG icon component for the Histopathology workflow task rendered via WorkflowIconBase.
SVG icon component for the Imaging workflow task showing a framed chart/waveform graphic.
SVG icon component for the Labs workflow task depicting a test tube shape.
SVG icon component for the PDVM Notified workflow task showing a speech bubble.
SVG icon component for the Surgery Report workflow task depicting a document with a scalpel line.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Renders the appropriate workflow SVG icon component based on a `type` string prop, using a map of workflow type keys to icon components.
Base SVG wrapper component for workflow icons that applies consistent size, stroke color, and stroke width tokens to its children.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Exports shared design tokens for workflow icons including per-type colors, icon size, and stroke width.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Empty file intended to define an authentication React context.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Empty file intended to define the authentication view component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, clearing the React Query cache on logout.
Empty file intended to define a login form component.
Empty file intended to define a logout button component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a newly authenticated user to enter their name and saves it via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Re: Empty file intended to define a registration form component.
frontend/src/features/auth/validation.ts: Empty file intended to hold authentication-related validation logic.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the checklist items configuration for surgery case tasks, along with helpers to get default selections, remaining incomplete items, and completed task counts.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Empty file intended to define a camera capture modal component.
Displays a collapsible surgery case card with patient info, species icon, and interactive workflow task checkboxes that toggle completion state.
Dialog for editing an existing surgery case's fields and task selections, pre-populating form state from the provided case and saving via `useUpdateCase`.
Dialog for creating a new surgery case with form validation, speech-to-text quick fill, structured text parsing, and previous case suggestions based on debounced field values.

Main list view component for surgery cases that handles filtering by species, task types, and completion status, sorting, searching, and rendering case cards with support for highlighting a specific case and CSV/PDF export.
A search input component with a clear button for filtering cases by any field.
A dropdown select control for choosing the sort order of the cases list, using predefined sort options.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, other), persisting selections to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by task types and completion status, persisting selections to sessionStorage.
A checklist editor component that supports both case creation mode (selecting which tasks apply) and completion mode (marking tasks as done), with color-coded styling per task.
A panel component that handles CSV export of all cases and CSV import with progress tracking, error reporting, and backend create/update mutations.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A React date input component that supports manual MM/DD/YYYY text entry with auto-formatting, validation, and a calendar popover picker. Exposes a ref and calls an optional onComplete callback when a valid date is fully entered.
Provides exportCasesToCsv and importCasesFromCsv functions for serializing SurgeryCase records to CSV and parsing CSV files back into case data with per-row validation and error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 17-column CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, a CsvRow type, and validation constants for species, sex, boolean, and date formats.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Exports pure functions to filter SurgeryCase arrays by species, by pending task types, by all tasks completed, and to exclude fully completed cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: A React hook that wraps the Web Speech API to provide start/stop recording, live transcript accumulation, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Exports preprocessOcrText, which normalizes whitespace, corrects common OCR character errors, and removes artifacts from raw OCR text output.
Exports parseStructuredText, which parses label:value formatted text line-by-line and maps recognized labels to CaseFormData fields including dates, species, sex, and string values.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a printable PDF report of surgery cases with outstanding tasks using a hidden iframe and the browser's native print dialog, with color-coded task badges.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of all surgery cases including remaining tasks, with proper field escaping and a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utility functions for PDF output, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex values to human-readable strings.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utility functions for CSV report output, converting Time, Species, and Sex values to human-readable strings.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters surgery cases by a search query against multiple text fields and also matches incomplete checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that orders surgery cases by arrival date or number of open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines constant option arrays for species and sex dropdowns, and the CaseFormData interface used in case creation/editing forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields and utility functions for converting between Date objects, nanosecond bigints, and formatted date strings.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard React component that displays surgery cases with filtering, searching, sorting, stats, and actions for creating cases and exporting a PDF.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions that extract open task items from surgery cases and calculate the total count of remaining tasks across all cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay (default 500ms), returning the debounced value.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider for React, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a custom hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend data fetching and mutations, covering user profiles, surgery cases, tasks, dashboard, and OpenAI config via the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light-mode design system, including colors for UI components and semantic fields.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript ambient module declaration for tesseract.js, defining interfaces for OCR workers, recognition results, and enums for page segmentation and OCR engine modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback for sensitive values like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends the theme with custom fonts and border radii, and registers the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for a bug-fix request targeting a Version 94 regression where Cases show a blank list on Dashboard and Cases pages. Documents the known issue, affected files, and the single existing fix feature request.
